column4: ⭐⭐⭐(excl. Satyr Children, Scylla's Tentacles and Spartoi)

column16: If activated in Circe's area and VIT=3, heal Circe one point
Give Arachne Torment if in the same area
Extra protection from area attacks if VIT≥3 and in an area with Hephaistos
Never suffer more than 1 wound per attack
⭐⭐*3 , all 3 units activate with one card, move other units towards Satyr Children after activation
Move tentacles into Scylla's surroundings (and Attack) after Scylla activates, no other activations
Lure enemies towards Sirens when activated
